org.ncgr.blast

Class SequenceHits

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ncgr.blast.SequenceHits
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable

    public class SequenceHits
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable
    A container class that stores SequenceHit instances for the same combined sequence (motif). The method equals() matches against sequence only; compareTo() is designed to sort by score, then number of hits, then sequence alpha. The score is the sum of SequenceHit.score values for DISTINCT query/subject IDs.
    Author:
    Sam Hokin

      • addSequenceHit

        public void addSequenceHit(SequenceHit sequenceHit)
        Adjust the score and add a SequenceHit to the set and add to uniqueHits set. The score is only incremented for new IDs.
